info.title: Gotcha API
info.description: The API that runs the Gotcha application.

Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description: API key specified in the Authorization request header as a Bearer token

get.description: Returns all of the arenas that are within 5 miles of latitude and longitude passed in.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: The latitude value for where the arenas should be near

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: The longitude value for where the arenas should be near

200.description: A JSON API formatted representation of an array of Arenas

type.description: The type of object that is represented

location_name.description: Name of the location where the Arena is located
